message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think it's a great deal for its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $200 is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $180. This product is truly high-quality and worth the investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $140 for it.
